title: Science Inquiry Design Integrating Purpose and Process: DBL-JBL Hybrid Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Personalized science inquiry activities utilizing learners' personal BYOD devices, providing problem-solving environments that replicate real scientific phenomena through VR simulations

learning_goals: Explain core concepts required in science experiment design and execution with over 80% accuracy using VR-based simulations
Evaluate the ability to integrate relevant theories to solve science problems presented in a problem-based learning (PBL) scenario
Systematically document and analyze scientific inquiry processes through collaboration with peers in a job-based learning (JBL) environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
